name: Fruits are all
description:
Fruits are all is my first game for a Ludum Dare Jam. In the game, you are Liz, a little square girl that is camping for collect fruits in the forest, but the place is full of scorpions and ghosts that steal your fruits.

  • Spending fruits you can get itens(actually, the single item that you can get is a big hummer)
  • You can spend fruits going to tent and interacting with it.
  • To attack, you need to unlock the big hummer(it price is 65 fruits).
  • Get 500 fruits to win the game.!

Controls:

  • Jump: Z/W(Keyboard) and Cross/A(Gamepad)
  • Attack: X/K(Keyboard and Cricle/B(Gamepad)
  • Interact: C/L(Keyboard) and Square/X(Gamepad)
  • Move: Arrow keys/A-D(Keyboard) and D-Pad

Devlog:

  • 1.0.0.0:
    • First version of game
  • 1.0.0.1:
    • Some bug corrections;
  • 1.0.1.0:
    • Some bug corrections;
    • decrease of hummer prize (100 fruits to 65);
  • 1.0.2.1:
    • Decreased fruits stolen by monsters.
    • Fixed a bug on interaction with tent.
  • 1.0.2.2:
    • More bug fixes;
  •  1.0.3.0:
    • Improved hammer, now you can attack while moving and jumping;
